com.camerontec.catalys.core.session.connection

Interface Connection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IConfigurable, IRegisterable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectionBase, FileConnection, NullConnection, SenderAwareConnection, SocketConnection, SSLSocketConnection

    public interface Connection
extends Serializable, IConfigurable
    Interface describing a FIX connection.

    The FIX protocol takes place over a connection between two parties.

    That connection may be a TCP/IP network connection, or any other connection as long as it conforms to this interface.

    In addition to implementing the methods in this interface, each Connection class should provide a constructor which takes a single Properties object as a parameter.

    For example, 

        public MyConnection( Properties properties );
    This constructor is used create Connection objects from configuration data.

    ConnectionBase implements some of this interface in a standard way and is a useful base class for Connection objects to inherit from.

    See Also:
    ConnectionBase, SocketConnection, FileConnection

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        Properties getProperties()
        Returns the properties that uniquely define this Connection.

        These properties are used by the ConnectionBase class to define the overridden "equals" method. Two objects are considered to be the same if their properties are identical.

        For example, the properties of a Socket connection would contain IP address and port number.

        Returns:
        Connection properties. Never returns null although properties may be empty.

      • setProperties

        void setProperties(Properties properties)
        Sets the properties that uniquely define this Connection.

        Should do nothing if properties are null.

        Parameters:
        properties - the properties that uniquely define this Connection

      • start

        void start()
    throws IOException
        A Connection should not actually try to connect until this method is called.

        Returns:
